title: How to Make Naan and Amritsari Kulcha

steps.headline: Sift the flour, salt and baking powder together.
Add the egg, milk, and sufficient water
Apply oil onto it and cover with a damp cloth
Divide this dough into 8 equal portions.
Stretch into a semi triangular shape.
Place in a pre-heated oven at 200 °C / or 400 °F/ gas mark 6.
Remove with tongs when it is crisp and brown on both sides.
steps.description: This should be around 7 to 10 minutes.

steps.headline: Prepare the dough following the steps above.
Stuff with boiled potatoes or onions.

text: Naan Sift the flour, salt and baking powder together.  Add the egg, milk, and sufficient water  Knead into a smooth dough.  Apply oil onto it and cover with a damp cloth  Divide this dough into 8 equal portions.  Stretch into a semi triangular shape.  Place in a pre-heated oven at 200 °C / or 400 °F/ gas mark 6.  Remove with tongs when it is crisp and brown on both sides. This should be around 7 to 10 minutes. Serve hot topped with butter.  Amritsari Kulcha Prepare the dough following the steps above.  Stuff with boiled potatoes or onions.  Flatten into a round shape.  Bake as mentioned before.
